cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.runtime

Interface IRuntime

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEnsembleComponentInformer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Runtime

    public interface IRuntime
extends IEnsembleComponentInformer
    Interface declaring jDEECo runtime functionality.
    Author:
    Michal Kit

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRunning()
      Checks whether the runtime is currently scheduling registered processes.
      void registerComponentsAndEnsembles(AbstractDEECoObjectProvider provider)
      Registers components and ensembles to the runtime.
      void setKnowledgeManager(java.lang.Object km)
      Sets the knowledge manager that is supposed to be used within this runtime.
      void setScheduler(java.lang.Object scheduler)
      Sets scheduler that will be used within the runtime.
      void startRuntime()
      Starts both component and ensemble processes scheduled execution.
      void stopRuntime()
      Stops both component and ensemble processes scheduled execution.
      void unsetKnowledgeManager(java.lang.Object km)
      Unsets the knowledge manager that might be used within this runtime.
      void unsetScheduler(java.lang.Object scheduler)
      Unsets the scheduler that might be used within this runtime.

      • Methods inherited from interface cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.runtime.IEnsembleComponentInformer

        getComponentKnowledge, getComponentProcesses, getComponentsIds, getEnsembleProcesses

    • Method Detail

      • setScheduler

        void setScheduler(java.lang.Object scheduler)
        Sets scheduler that will be used within the runtime. Used by the OSGi framework.
        Parameters:
        scheduler - reference to the scheduler instance that needs to be used within this runtime.

      • unsetScheduler

        void unsetScheduler(java.lang.Object scheduler)
        Unsets the scheduler that might be used within this runtime. Used by the OSGi framework.
        Parameters:
        scheduler - reference to the scheduler instacne that needs to be unset.

      • setKnowledgeManager

        void setKnowledgeManager(java.lang.Object km)
        Sets the knowledge manager that is supposed to be used within this runtime. Used by the OSGi framework.
        Parameters:
        km - knowledge manager instance that needs to be set.

      • unsetKnowledgeManager

        void unsetKnowledgeManager(java.lang.Object km)
        Unsets the knowledge manager that might be used within this runtime. Used by the OSGi framework.
        Parameters:
        km - knowledge manager instance that needs to be unset.

      • registerComponentsAndEnsembles

        void registerComponentsAndEnsembles(AbstractDEECoObjectProvider provider)
        Registers components and ensembles to the runtime.
        Parameters:
        provider - provider instatnce that delivers components and ensembles definitions.
